verses.text: Now \w king|strong="H4428"\w* Sedecias \w the|strong="H0834"\w* \w son|strong="H1121"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* Josias \w reigned|strong="H4427"\w* \w instead|strong="H8478"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* Jechonias \w the|strong="H0834"\w* \w son|strong="H1121"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* Joakim: \w whom|strong="H0834"\w* Nabuchodonosor \w king|strong="H4428"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w Babylon|strong="H0894"\w* \w made|strong="H0834"\w* \w king|strong="H4428"\w* \w in|strong="H0776"\w* \w the|strong="H0834"\w* \w land|strong="H0776"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* Juda.

\w But|strong="H3808"\w* \w neither|strong="H3808"\w* \w he|strong="H0834"\w*, \w nor|strong="H3808"\w* \w his|strong="H3068"\w* \w servants|strong="H5650"\w*, \w nor|strong="H3808"\w* \w the|strong="H0834"\w* \w people|strong="H5971"\w* \w of|strong="H0776"\w* \w the|strong="H0834"\w* \w land|strong="H0776"\w* \w did|strong="H0834"\w* \w obey|strong="H8085"\w* \w the|strong="H0834"\w* \w words|strong="H1697"\w* \w of|strong="H0776"\w* \w the|strong="H0834"\w* \w Lord|strong="H3068"\w*, \w that|strong="H0834"\w* \w he|strong="H0834"\w* \w spoke|strong="H1696"\w* \w in|strong="H0413"\w* \w the|strong="H0834"\w* \w hand|strong="H3027"\w* \w of|strong="H0776"\w* Jeremias \w the|strong="H0834"\w* \w prophet|strong="H5030"\w*.

\w And|strong="H1121"\w* \w king|strong="H4428"\w* Sedecias \w sent|strong="H7971"\w* Juchal \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w son|strong="H1121"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* Selemias, \w and|strong="H1121"\w* Sophonias \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w son|strong="H1121"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* Maasias \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w priest|strong="H3548"\w* \w to|strong="H0413"\w* Jeremias \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w prophet|strong="H5030"\w*, \w saying|strong="H0559"\w*: \w Pray|strong="H6419"\w* \w to|strong="H0413"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w Lord|strong="H3068"\w* \w our|strong="H3068"\w* \w God|strong="H0430"\w* \w for|strong="H1157"\w* \w us|strong="H4994"\w*.

\w Now|strong="H5414"\w* Jeremias walked freely \w in|strong="H0935"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w midst|strong="H8432"\w* \w of|strong="H1004"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w people|strong="H5971"\w*: \w for|strong="H1004"\w* \w they|strong="H3808"\w* \w had|strong="H5414"\w* \w not|strong="H3808"\w* \w as|strong="H0935"\w* \w yet|strong="H5414"\w* \w cast|strong="H5414"\w* \w him|strong="H5414"\w* \w into|strong="H0935"\w* \w prison|strong="H1004"\w*. \w And|strong="H0935"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w army|strong="H5971"\w* \w of|strong="H1004"\w* Pharao \w was|strong="H1004"\w* \w come|strong="H0935"\w* \w out|strong="H3318"\w* \w of|strong="H1004"\w* Egypt: \w and|strong="H0935"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* Chaldeans \w that|strong="H3808"\w* besieged Jerusalem, hearing \w these|strong="H5971"\w* tidings, \w departed|strong="H3318"\w* \w from|strong="H0935"\w* Jerusalem.

\w And|strong="H3389"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* word \w of|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* Lord \w came|strong="H3318"\w* \w to|strong="H5921"\w* Jeremias \w the|strong="H0853"\w* prophet, saying:

\w Thus|strong="H1961"\w* saith \w the|strong="H0559"\w* \w Lord|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H0559"\w* \w God|strong="H3068"\w* \w of|strong="H3068"\w* Israel: \w Thus|strong="H1961"\w* \w shall|strong="H3068"\w* \w you|strong="H0413"\w* \w say|strong="H0559"\w* \w to|strong="H0413"\w* \w the|strong="H0559"\w* king \w of|strong="H3068"\w* Juda, \w who|strong="H3068"\w* \w sent|strong="H0559"\w* \w you|strong="H0413"\w* \w to|strong="H0413"\w* inquire \w of|strong="H3068"\w* \w me|strong="H0413"\w*: Behold \w the|strong="H0559"\w* army \w of|strong="H3068"\w* Pharao, \w which|strong="H1697"\w* \w is|strong="H3068"\w* \w come|strong="H1961"\w* forth \w to|strong="H0413"\w* help \w you|strong="H0413"\w*, \w shall|strong="H3068"\w* return \w into|strong="H0413"\w* \w their|strong="H3068"\w* \w own|strong="H1961"\w* land, \w into|strong="H0413"\w* Egypt.

\w And|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* Chaldeans \w shall|strong="H3068"\w* \w come|strong="H3318"\w* \w again|strong="H7725"\w*, \w and|strong="H3068"\w* fight \w against|strong="H0413"\w* \w this|strong="H3541"\w* city, \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w take|strong="H7725"\w* \w it|strong="H7725"\w*, \w and|strong="H3068"\w* burn \w it|strong="H7725"\w* \w with|strong="H0413"\w* fire.

Thus saith \w the|strong="H5921"\w* Lord: Deceive not \w your|strong="H5921"\w* souls, saying: \w The|strong="H5921"\w* \w Chaldeans|strong="H3778"\w* \w shall|strong="H3920"\w* \w surely|strong="H7725"\w* depart \w and|strong="H7725"\w* \w go|strong="H7725"\w* \w away|strong="H7725"\w* \w from|strong="H7725"\w* \w us|strong="H5921"\w*: \w for|strong="H5921"\w* \w they|strong="H5921"\w* \w shall|strong="H3920"\w* not \w go|strong="H7725"\w* \w away|strong="H7725"\w*;

\w But|strong="H3588"\w* \w if|strong="H3588"\w* \w you|strong="H3588"\w* \w should|strong="H3068"\w* \w even|strong="H3588"\w* beat all \w the|strong="H0559"\w* army \w of|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H0559"\w* \w Chaldeans|strong="H3778"\w* \w that|strong="H3588"\w* fight \w against|strong="H5921"\w* \w you|strong="H3588"\w*, \w and|strong="H1980"\w* \w there|strong="H3068"\w* \w should|strong="H3068"\w* \w be|strong="H3808"\w* \w left|strong="H1980"\w* \w of|strong="H3068"\w* \w them|strong="H5921"\w* \w some|strong="H5315"\w* wounded \w men|strong="H0559"\w*: \w they|strong="H3588"\w* \w shall|strong="H3068"\w* rise \w up|strong="H5921"\w*, every \w man|strong="H5315"\w* \w from|strong="H5921"\w* \w his|strong="H5921"\w* tent, \w and|strong="H1980"\w* burn \w this|strong="H3541"\w* city \w with|strong="H1980"\w* \w Are|strong="H3068"\w*.

\w Now|strong="H3588"\w* \w when|strong="H3588"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w army|strong="H2428"\w* \w of|strong="H0376"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w Chaldeans|strong="H3778"\w* \w was|strong="H0376"\w* gone \w away|strong="H3605"\w* \w from|strong="H0376"\w* Jerusalem, \w because|strong="H3588"\w* \w of|strong="H0376"\w* Pharaoâ€™s \w army|strong="H2428"\w*,

Jeremias \w went|strong="H5927"\w* forth \w out|strong="H6440"\w* \w of|strong="H6440"\w* \w Jerusalem|strong="H3389"\w* \w to|strong="H1961"\w* \w go|strong="H5927"\w* \w into|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H6440"\w* \w land|strong="H6440"\w* \w of|strong="H6440"\w* Benjamin: \w and|strong="H3389"\w* \w to|strong="H1961"\w* divide \w a|strong="H1961"\w* possession \w there|strong="H1961"\w* \w in|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H6440"\w* \w presence|strong="H6440"\w* \w of|strong="H6440"\w* \w the|strong="H6440"\w* citizens.

\w And|strong="H0776"\w* \w when|strong="H3318"\w* \w he|strong="H8033"\w* \w was|strong="H0776"\w* \w come|strong="H3318"\w* \w to|strong="H3389"\w* \w the|strong="H8432"\w* gate \w of|strong="H0776"\w* \w Benjamin|strong="H1144"\w*, \w the|strong="H8432"\w* captain \w of|strong="H0776"\w* \w the|strong="H8432"\w* gate, \w who|strong="H0776"\w* \w I|strong="H0776"\w* \w was|strong="H0776"\w* \w there|strong="H8033"\w* \w in|strong="H0776"\w* \w his|strong="H8432"\w* turn, \w was|strong="H0776"\w* \w one|strong="H0776"\w* named Jerias, \w the|strong="H8432"\w* son \w of|strong="H0776"\w* Selemias, \w the|strong="H8432"\w* son \w of|strong="H0776"\w* Hananias: \w and|strong="H0776"\w* \w he|strong="H8033"\w* \w took|strong="H3318"\w* hold \w of|strong="H0776"\w* Jeremias \w the|strong="H8432"\w* prophet, saying: Thou art fleeing \w to|strong="H3389"\w* \w the|strong="H8432"\w* Chaldeans.

\w And|strong="H1121"\w* Jeremias \w answered|strong="H0559"\w*: \w It|strong="H1931"\w* \w is|strong="H1931"\w* \w not|strong="H1961"\w* \w so|strong="H1961"\w*, \w I|strong="H0559"\w* \w am|strong="H1961"\w* \w not|strong="H1961"\w* fleeing \w to|strong="H0413"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w Chaldeans|strong="H3778"\w*. \w But|strong="H1961"\w* \w he|strong="H1931"\w* hearkened \w not|strong="H1961"\w* \w to|strong="H0413"\w* \w him|strong="H0413"\w*: \w so|strong="H1961"\w* Jerias \w took|strong="H8610"\w* Jeremias \w and|strong="H1121"\w* \w brought|strong="H1961"\w* \w him|strong="H0413"\w* \w to|strong="H0413"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* princes.

Wherefore \w the|strong="H0559"\w* \w princes|strong="H8269"\w* \w were|strong="H0369"\w* angry \w with|strong="H0413"\w* Jeremias, \w and|strong="H0935"\w* \w they|strong="H5921"\w* beat \w him|strong="H0413"\w*, \w and|strong="H0935"\w* \w cast|strong="H5307"\w* \w him|strong="H0413"\w* \w into|strong="H0413"\w* \w the|strong="H0559"\w* prison \w that|strong="H8085"\w* \w was|strong="H0369"\w* \w in|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H0559"\w* house \w of|strong="H8269"\w* \w Jonathan|strong="H0559"\w* \w the|strong="H0559"\w* scribe: \w for|strong="H5921"\w* \w he|strong="H3808"\w* \w was|strong="H0369"\w* \w chief|strong="H8269"\w* \w over|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H0559"\w* prison.

\w So|strong="H6213"\w* Jeremias \w went|strong="H1004"\w* \w into|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w house|strong="H1004"\w* \w of|strong="H1004"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w prison|strong="H3608"\w*, \w and|strong="H1004"\w* \w into|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* dungeon: \w and|strong="H1004"\w* Jeremias remained there many days.

\w Then|strong="H0935"\w* Sedecias \w the|strong="H3588"\w* king, sending, \w took|strong="H0935"\w* \w him|strong="H0413"\w*: \w and|strong="H0935"\w* \w asked|strong="H0413"\w* \w him|strong="H0413"\w* secretly \w in|strong="H3427"\w* \w his|strong="H0935"\w* \w house|strong="H1004"\w*, \w and|strong="H0935"\w* \w said|strong="H0413"\w*: \w Is|strong="H3117"\w* \w there|strong="H8033"\w*, thinkest thou, \w any|strong="H3588"\w* word \w from|strong="H0935"\w* \w the|strong="H3588"\w* Lord? \w And|strong="H0935"\w* Jeremias \w said|strong="H0413"\w*: \w There|strong="H8033"\w* \w is|strong="H3117"\w*. \w And|strong="H0935"\w* \w he|strong="H3588"\w* \w said|strong="H0413"\w*: Thou shalt \w be|strong="H1004"\w* delivered \w into|strong="H0413"\w* \w the|strong="H3588"\w* hands \w of|strong="H1004"\w* \w the|strong="H3588"\w* king \w of|strong="H1004"\w* Babylon.

\w And|strong="H3068"\w* Jeremias \w said|strong="H0559"\w* \w to|strong="H0559"\w* \w king|strong="H4428"\w* Sedecias: \w In|strong="H3068"\w* \w what|strong="H1697"\w* \w have|strong="H3426"\w* \w I|strong="H5414"\w* offended \w against|strong="H3027"\w* thee, \w or|strong="H1004"\w* thy servants, \w or|strong="H1004"\w* thy people, \w that|strong="H1697"\w* thou hast \w cast|strong="H5414"\w* \w me|strong="H5414"\w* \w into|strong="H3027"\w* \w prison|strong="H1004"\w*?

\w Where|strong="H4100"\w* \w are|strong="H4100"\w* \w your|strong="H5414"\w* prophets \w that|strong="H3588"\w* prophesied \w to|strong="H0413"\w* \w you|strong="H3588"\w*, \w and|strong="H4428"\w* \w said|strong="H0559"\w*: \w The|strong="H0853"\w* \w king|strong="H4428"\w* \w of|strong="H4428"\w* Babylon \w shall|strong="H1004"\w* \w not|strong="H2088"\w* come \w against|strong="H0413"\w* \w you|strong="H3588"\w*, \w and|strong="H4428"\w* \w against|strong="H0413"\w* \w this|strong="H2088"\w* land?

\w Now|strong="H0935"\w* \w therefore|strong="H0776"\w* hear, \w I|strong="H0834"\w* beseech thee, \w my|strong="H5921"\w* lord \w the|strong="H0559"\w* \w king|strong="H4428"\w*: \w let|strong="H3808"\w* \w my|strong="H5921"\w* petition \w be|strong="H3808"\w* accepted \w in|strong="H5921"\w* thy sight: \w and|strong="H0935"\w* send \w me|strong="H5921"\w* \w not|strong="H3808"\w* \w back|strong="H0935"\w* \w into|strong="H0935"\w* \w the|strong="H0559"\w* house \w of|strong="H4428"\w* \w Jonathan|strong="H0559"\w* \w the|strong="H0559"\w* scribe, lest \w I|strong="H0834"\w* die \w there|strong="H0894"\w*.

\w Then|strong="H6258"\w* \w king|strong="H4428"\w* Sedecias commanded \w that|strong="H8085"\w* Jeremias \w should|strong="H5608"\w* \w be|strong="H4191"\w* committed \w into|strong="H5307"\w* \w the|strong="H6440"\w* entry \w of|strong="H4428"\w* \w the|strong="H6440"\w* \w prison|strong="H1004"\w*: \w and|strong="H4428"\w* \w that|strong="H8085"\w* \w they|strong="H8033"\w* \w should|strong="H5608"\w* \w give|strong="H7725"\w* \w him|strong="H6440"\w* daily \w a|strong="H8085"\w* piece \w of|strong="H4428"\w* bread, beside broth, till all \w the|strong="H6440"\w* bread \w in|strong="H1004"\w* \w the|strong="H6440"\w* city \w were|strong="H6440"\w* \w spent|strong="H7725"\w*: \w and|strong="H4428"\w* Jeremias remained \w in|strong="H1004"\w* \w the|strong="H6440"\w* entry \w of|strong="H4428"\w* \w the|strong="H6440"\w* \w prison|strong="H1004"\w*.
